Pre-Game Insights: Coach JJ Redick emphasized the importance of screening in their pregame meeting
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James made his preseason debut on a historic night playing with his son Bronny James
The Lakers offense was highly efficient with their main rotation players in the first half
Others: The Lakers recorded 10 assists on their first 12 field goals
The Lakers ran plenty of actions to set up a better shot profile for all players, especially LeBron and AD
